metadata.title: CVE-2020-29510 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The encoding/xml package in Go versions 1.15 and earlier does not correctlypreserve the semantics of directives during tokenization round-trips, whichallows an attacker to craft inputs that behave in conflicting ways duringdifferent stages of processing in affected downstream applications.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
